name: Product Data
content: Generate a product object for a retail store.

name: User Sign-Up
content: A user signup object for the email: {{ Email }} with password: {{ Password }}

name: Store Email
content: Write an email from a store manager to a service provider asking for service on an asset.
example: Dear Service Team, I’m reaching out to schedule maintenance for the {{ equipment }} located at {{ store_location }}.

name: Customer Info
content: Generate a JSON object for customer information including name and contact details.

name: Support Ticket
content: Write a support ticket where a customer complains about {{ ComplaintReason }} and requests a refund.
example:
Subject: Shipping Delay on Order #3

Hi, I’m still waiting for my order placed on 3/2... Please refund my payment

name: Inventory Update
content: Generate a JSON object to update product inventory for an e-commerce store.

name: Job Application
content: Write a cover letter for a software developer applying to a startup.
example: Dear Hiring Manager, I’m excited to apply for the developer position at {{ company_name }}...

name: Order Confirm
content: Generate a JSON object for an order confirmation, including the order ID and delivery date.
